chapter.title: Before You Install
chapter.para: This chapter covers requirements for running ${projectName} software. If you have a special request to support a component or combination not listed here, contact ForgeRock at info@forgerock.com.

section.title: Which ${projectName} to Use
section.para: There are two versions of the software, core ${projectName} and ${projectName} Federation. ${projectName} Federation consists of ${projectName} plus additional Federation libraries. Unless you require Federation capabilities, use core ${projectName}.

section.title: JDK Version
section.para: This release of ${projectName} requires Java Development Kit 6 or Java Development Kit 7. ForgeRock recommends the most recent update of Java 6 or 7 to ensure you have the latest security fixes.

section.para: See the chapter on Configuring Deployment Containers in the Guide to ${projectName} for details on setting up your web application container.

section.title: Scripting Support
section.para: This release of ${projectName} supports the Groovy scripting language. For examples using Groovy scripts for Filters and Handlers, see Scripting Filters & Handlers.
